name: UniSmart
0:
”Alexa, turn on Outlet 1”
”Alexa, turn off Outlet 1”
”Alexa, turn on Outlet 2”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
To use thís skill, you must have a NousLogic HomeKit Smart Power Plug hardware, <APP> downloaded, an account registered in-app and been shared by the owner in iOS; then you are ready to go.
With this skill you can comfortably control (turn on/off) the Smart Power Plugs made by Nous company using voice command.
